rules_text:
Flash
Flying
When Whirring Inspector enters, target player reveals their hand. You may exile a nonland card from among them until your next turn. When you don’t, exile up to one target nonland permanent that player controls until your next turn. [i](That card returns to its owner’s hand, or that permanent returns to the battlefield under its owner’s control.)[/i]
notes:
Flag: Instant speed discard might be unfun
Art Validated
